channel.title: Too-reals on Too Real
channel.description: Recent content in Too-reals on Too Real

item.title: Function Dispatch
item.description: In which we investigate the different ways functions are called and what it means for performance…

item.title: Properties
item.description: Let’s develop an understanding of how the UnrealScript virtual machine handles variable data…

item.title: Load Order
item.description: This article investigate what kinds of load orders there are in XCOM 2 and how to work with them…

item.title: Multitasking
item.description: This article explains the different kinds of parallelism and concurrency happening in XCOM 2 and UnrealScript despite the engine’s single-threaded nature…

item.title: History
item.description: This article reviews the XCOM 2 implementation of the MVC architecture and investigates some finer details and consequences…

item.title: Names and Strings
item.description: This article introduces the blog post series, and looks into detail at how strings and names are implemented under the hood in UnrealScript…
